## Description
Describe the UI/UX issue you encountered.

## Location
Where in the application does this issue occur? (menu, dialog, editor, etc.)

## Current Experience
What is the current user experience?

## Expected Experience
What would be a better user experience?

## Screenshots
Please provide screenshots if possible.

## Suggested Fix
If you have ideas on how to improve this, please share.
